Trade/Device Name(s): BD ProbeTec Neisseria gonorrhoeae (GC) Qx Amplified DNA Assay
Regulation Name(s): Neisseria spp. direct serological test reagents
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD ProbeTec Neisseria gonorrhoeae (GC) Qx Amplified DNA Assay using SDA technology for detection of Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA in clinician-collected female endocervical and male urethral swabs, patient-collected vaginal swabs, and female/male urine specimens to aid in diagnosis of gonococcal urogenital disease in symptomatic and asymptomatic individuals
